name: code-viewer
description: Highlight source code syntax with highlight.js.
author: egy186

scripts.copy: copyfiles --up 1 node_modules/@highlightjs/cdn-assets/highlight.min.js "node_modules/@highlightjs/cdn-assets/styles/**/*" --exclude "node_modules/@highlightjs/cdn-assets/styles/**/*.css" dist/resources/lib && copyfiles --up 1 "node_modules/@highlightjs/cdn-assets/styles/**/*.min.css" dist/resources/lib && copyfiles --up 1 "src/resources/**" dist
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:manifest
scripts.version: node lib/version.js && git add docs/updates.json src/manifest.json
